keys.item: Your user account has been locked. To reactivate it, please use the "forgot password" function, to receive a new password.
Display E-mail address in public profile
If you don't want to display a certain profile field, just untick the respective field.
While sending the E-mail with your new password an error has occurred.
Please enter your user name or E-mail address of your user account.
An E-mail with your new password has been successfully sent to your E-mail address.
Please type in a valid birthday.
Please type in a valid ICQ number.
With this module you can administer the users.
Either the user name or the password is wrong.
While creating the user account an error has occurred.
The user account has been created successfully.
Please select an access level for this user.
Please select whether you want to display your address in the public profile or not.
Please select the format of your birthday in which it should be displayed in your public profile.
Please select whether you want to display your country in the public profile or not.
Please select whether users should be allowed to register on this website.
Please select the language in which you want to see the website.
Please select whether you want to display your E-mail address in the public profile or not.
Please select whether the user should be a super user or not.
Please either enter the E-mail address or the user name you used with the registration.
Either the password is empty or there is a typo in the repetition.
There is already an user account registered with the same E-mail address.
There is already an user account registered with the same user name.
